questions.question: What does the 'var' keyword do in JavaScript?
Which keyword is used to declare a block-scoped variable?
What is the correct way to convert a string to an integer in JavaScript?

What does JSON.stringify() do?
options: Converts an object to a JSON string
Parses a JSON string into an object
Converts a number to a string
questions.correctAnswer: Converts an object to a JSON string

options: It refers to the current object
It refers to the global object
questions.correctAnswer: It refers to the current object
